metadata.title: CVE-2015-2308 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Eval injection vulnerability in the HttpCache class in HttpKernel inSymfony 2.x before 2.3.27, 2.4.x and 2.5.x before 2.5.11, and 2.6.x before2.6.6 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via alanguage="php" attribute of a SCRIPT element.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2308` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-symfony-asset - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-browser-kit - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-class-loader - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-config - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-console - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-css-selector - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-debug - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-debug-bundle - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-dependency-injection - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-dom-crawler - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-event-dispatcher - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-expression-language - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-filesystem - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-finder - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-form - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-framework-bundle - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-http-foundation - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-http-kernel - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-intl - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-locale - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-monolog-bridge - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-options-resolver - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-phpunit-bridge - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-process - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-property-access - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-proxy-manager-bridge - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-routing - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-security - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-security-bundle - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-serializer - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-stopwatch - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-swiftmailer-bridge - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-templating - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-translation - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-twig-bridge - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-twig-bundle - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-validator - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-var-dumper - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-web-profiler-bundle - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
php-symfony-yaml - 2.7.10-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: symfony package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.10-0ubuntu2').
